game.title: The Lost Temple
game.objective: Find the ancient artifact hidden within the Lost Temple.
game.description: Rumors have been circulating about a long-abandoned temple deep in the forest, where an ancient civilization hid a powerful relic. Your quest is to find and retrieve this artifact before it falls into the wrong hands.
game.reward: A magical amulet granting increased resistance to elemental attacks
game.quest-giver: Elder Thorne, village elder of Oakwood Village

task.objective: Gather information about the temple's location from local villagers.
task.description: Talk to the villagers in Oakwood Village and gather any clues they may have about the Lost Temple's whereabouts.

task.objective: Navigate through the treacherous forest path to reach the temple.
task.description: Be cautious of wild beasts and rival treasure hunters as you make your way through the dense forest.
task.location: The forest trail east of Oakwood Village

task.objective: Solve the ancient temple's puzzles to unlock the artifact chamber.
task.description: Use your wits and any clues you've gathered to overcome the deadly traps and puzzles that guard the relic.
task.location: The Lost Temple, artifact chamber entrance
